ingredients.ingredient: ⅓ cup shredded pizza cheese blend

cookingTips: Use split bagels to provide enough surface area for even topping distribution
Spread sauce evenly to prevent dry spots; don't overload with toppings
Toast at 400°F for 5-7 minutes until cheese melts and edges toast lightly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user on proper topping ratios for mini pizzas and how to achieve melted cheese without burning bagel edges.
